description: This file defines a React functional component named 'ConnectorCard' that displays information about a connector (such as Jira or Confluence). It includes functionality to fetch and display connector status, connect/disconnect actions, and displays related metadata and errors.

methods.name: ConnectorCard
methods.description: React component that renders a card interface for managing and displaying the status of a connector.

methods.name: loadStatus
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch and update the connector's current status.

methods.name: handleDisconnect
methods.description: Asynchronous function to handle disconnecting the connector.
